page.title: 11GAMES WE PLAY:ST.ALBANS
page.content: These are games people in our class play in the playground.{TENNIS, COPS {AND ROBBERS, PICCADILLY, RUGBY, {CRICKET, FOOTBALL AND SKIPPING.}The 2 most popular games are tennis and football. Most of the girls play tennis and most of the boys play football. Some games are very unusual and some people don't know them. My favourite game is skipping and I am the only person who likes skipping a lot. My best friend likes playing cops and robbers. The most uncommon game is Piccadilly. One person hides while the others stand at a post and count to 100. Then they run between 2 posts and the other person runs out and tries to catch them between posts. If he succeeds he shouts "Piccadilly".
